org.orgName: Група Промисловців і підприємців - Воля народу
Industrialists and Entrepreneurs and People's Will Group

state.note: The group later bloced with gr.demi (C)
The group later merged into fr.edup (C)
In 2004, the party supported Yanukovych, in 2005 it merged into pp.But
In June 2002, the fraction initially fell into 6 factions and groups: gr.narod (C), fr.ppu-lab (CCL), gr.au (C), fr.ndp (CCL), fr.reg (C) and gr.ech (C)
In Nov 2003, the group merged into fr.reg
Based on fr.edu, renamed to gr.soyuz ; https://www.pravda.com.ua/news/2002/07/5/2989640/
Several group members were affiliated with the other C groups in the Rada at other times.
